name: player50
description: A web interface for viewing CS50 videos.

scripts.init: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp src/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.build: npm run init && npm run bundle
scripts.dev: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'npm run serve'
scripts.bundle: browserify -t babelify app.js -o dist/index.js -p [ parcelify -o dist/index.css -t sass-css-stream -d ./src ]
scripts.watch: watchify -t babelify app.js -o dist/index.js -p [ parcelify -wo dist/index.css -t sass-css-stream -d ./src ]
